page.title: 02The Landscape/Employment
page.content: There is also alot of wildlife in the area.I went to a pit,which probably used to be a mine,and there I saw lots of signs of animals,which include two foxes dens,a badger set,eight rabbit burrows,and several vole holes.I also saw a rabbit. I visited a pond in a field,around the pond there were a few moorhen nests,In the reeds and rushes.There were some tadpoles swimming in the pond. {Employment} There are several small farm owners in the area,but employment on farms is small.People commute to work to Ellesmere,Oswestry,Wrexham and Shrewsbury.Employers in the area are Elson Timber Company ,milking machinery manufacturers Fulwood and Bland, Fabdec and the Dairy Crest dairy, all in Ellesmere.
